discourse_list.title: MIPs Portal: A community developed site to explore all our MIPs

content.content: Hi Everyone, I’d like to share with all the community the first iteration on the MIPs portal, a website to explore all our MIPs and to follow their development / process: https://mips.makerdao.com/ Repository    github.com    DSpotDevelopers/makerdao-mips This project handles the . Contribute to DSpotDevelopers/makerdao-mips development by creating an account on GitHub.      image1631×898 106 KB We’re working in a second iteration where we should bring more features in and improve some of the current features. The site is a work in progress, but it’ll be great to receive already community feedback about it. I’ll be going through this first version quickly on the governance call tomorrow My team have been working together with @juan to have this first iteration ready. Thank you very much to @juan, @blimpa and @LongForWisdom for their feedback!
Amazing work. Glad I didn’t start a MIPs Index!
